name: SpaceWars (M3rez)
description:
SpaceWars is a space shooter type game. It's made of a few levels in which your goal is to kill all enemies. You can collect coins which add up to your final score and power ups to boost your weapon. The game has one-player and two-players modes.

You can play in your browser or download SpaceWarsSetup.exe file that will install the game on your PC.
